question_stem:
Consider using the following data set of 1000 patients to create a model to predict lung cancer. There are 4 columns of interest:
Cancer: Lung cancer status (0 = no, 1 = yes)
Age: Age of patient
BMI: Body Mass Index of patient
Smoking: Smoking status (0 = non-smoker, 1 = smoker)

Question 1
What is the response variable for this model?
A
Age
B
BMI
C
Cancer
D
Smoking
